dialog: Hey you, stop sleeping! The game’s not over, you know.
HEY WAKE UP! THIS ISN’T A GAME OVER SCREEN, YOU IMBECILE!
I’m sorry, that was too harsh. Let’s try this again. (Ahem)
Dearest traveler from a land much more HD, it is not time for you to perish. Not yet.
You still have a stage to finish! Now go, return back to your friends, oh young stretchy cat!
